mapper.select: select BOARD_NUM boardNum, BOARD_WRITER boardWriter, BOARD_SUBJECT boardSubject, BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, WRITER_IP writerIp, board_date boardDate from myboard
mapper.insert: insert into myboard(board_num, board_writer, board_subject, board_content, writer_ip, board_date) values (seq_num3.nextval, #{boardWriter}, #{boardSubject}, #{boardContent}, #{writerIp}, #{boardDate})
mapper.update: update myboard set BOARD_WRITER = #{boardWriter}, BOARD_SUBJECT = #{boardSubject}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, WRITER_IP = #{writerIp}, board_date = #{boardDate} where BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
